dollarPlans.title: $1 Million Dollar Plan
dollarPlans.description: A month-to-month commitment, offering core marketing services.

keyFeatures.title: Social Media Management
keyFeatures.description: Up to 5 posts/month on 1 platform, basic engagement.

keyFeatures.title: Email Marketing Funnels
keyFeatures.description: 1 funnel with up to 3 emails for lead nurturing.

dollarPlans.title: $3 Million Dollar Plan
dollarPlans.description: A comprehensive plan with enhanced marketing efforts.

keyFeatures.title: Social Media Management
keyFeatures.description: Up to 10 posts/month on 2 platforms, basic engagement.

keyFeatures.title: SEO Optimization
keyFeatures.description: Up to 5 pages, basic keyword research & competitor analysis.

dollarPlans.title: $5 Million Dollar Plan
dollarPlans.description: A balanced plan for consistent lead generation and growth.

keyFeatures.title: Social Media Management
keyFeatures.description: Up to 20 posts/month across 3 platforms, monthly analytics.

keyFeatures.title: PR & Backlinking
keyFeatures.description: Monthly press coverage and referring domain building.

dollarPlans.title: $10 Million Dollar Plan
dollarPlans.description: An advanced plan for aggressive marketing strategies.

keyFeatures.title: Social Media Management
keyFeatures.description: Up to 40 posts/month across 4 platforms with advanced engagement.

keyFeatures.title: Content Creation
keyFeatures.description: 6 blog posts/month (1,500+ words), videos & interactive content.

keyFeatures.title: PR & Backlinking
keyFeatures.description: Regular PR campaigns and advanced link-building strategies.

dollarPlans.title: $15 Million Dollar Plan
dollarPlans.description: A premium plan for market dominance.

keyFeatures.title: Content Creation & Management
keyFeatures.description: Unlimited blogs, premium videos, and multimedia campaigns.

keyFeatures.title: SEO Optimization
keyFeatures.description: Full-site optimization, competitor analysis, real-time reporting.

keyFeatures.title: PR & Backlinking
keyFeatures.description: Extensive PR campaigns and global link-building strategy.

focusPlans.title: Public Relations Plan
focusPlans.description: A comprehensive PR strategy designed to boost brand visibility and reputation.

keyFeatures.title: Basic Tier
keyFeatures.description: $3,000/month - Press release creation and distribution to local media.

keyFeatures.title: Standard Tier
keyFeatures.description: $5,000/month - Press release creation, national media outreach, and social media PR campaigns.

keyFeatures.title: Advanced Tier
keyFeatures.description: $8,000/month - Crisis management, thought leadership articles, and media training.

keyFeatures.title: Premium Tier
keyFeatures.description: $12,000/month - Full-scale PR strategy, influencer partnerships, and global media outreach.

focusPlans.title: Social Media Management Plan
focusPlans.description: Focused solely on social media growth, engagement, and content creation.

keyFeatures.title: Basic Tier
keyFeatures.description: $1,200/month - Up to 5 posts/week on 1 platform, basic engagement (e.g., responding to comments/messages).

keyFeatures.title: Standard Tier
keyFeatures.description: $2,500/month - Up to 10 posts/week on 2 platforms, hashtag research, and analytics reporting.

keyFeatures.title: Advanced Tier
keyFeatures.description: $4,000/month - Up to 15 posts/week on 3 platforms, influencer collaboration, and engagement strategy.

keyFeatures.title: Premium Tier
keyFeatures.description: $6,000/month - Unlimited posts on all platforms, proactive engagement, and audience growth strategies.

focusPlans.title: Appointment-Ready Leads
focusPlans.description: Focused on delivering pre-qualified leads ready to book appointments.

keyFeatures.description: All leads are pre-qualified and ready to book appointments.
Custom lead targeting and profiling available.

focusPlans.title: Complete SEO Optimization Plan
focusPlans.description: Dedicated to driving organic traffic and improving online visibility.
